meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - Oh boy, are we in for a treat! Let's dive into the wild and crazy world of Far Cry 5!

First off, we've got Gaming Age telling us that this is the best Far Cry yet. And we know that's no small potatoes! I mean, who doesn't love blowing stuff up in the middle of nowhere? But, you know what they say - you can't have too much of a good thing. Too bad Ubisoft decided to keep playing it safe with more of the same old, same old.

Now, 3DJuegos is jumping on the bandwagon saying that Far Cry 5 delivers the chaos in a new and sophisticated way. And I'm like, "Um, isn't that just what Far Cry is anyways?" But hey, at least they're consistent! It's all hands on deck for these folks!

Next up, COGconnected is trying to convince us that this game is something special. They're saying it's a hootin' and hollerin' good time with the good ol' boys and gals of 'Murica. And hey, when you get right down to it, isn't that what we're all looking for in a game - a wild ride?

Then there's Video Chums chiming in saying that Far Cry 5 didn't quite live up to its full potential. They're talking about the lack of innovation and how it basically just reinvents the wheel from previous games. Bummer, dude!

Twinfinite is taking a more laid-back approach, basically saying that this game is more of the same old if you're already a fan of the series. But hey, who doesn't love blowing stuff up in different places? It's like they say - "If it ain't broke, don't fix it!"

Last but not least, we've got Game Informer with their critique of Far Cry 5 being a beautifully constructed world that's just too predictably bland. They're complaining about the lack of innovation and how it rehashes things from previous games. Yeah, yeah, I know - it's like they say: "If you want something new and exciting, you gotta shake things up!"

Oh, and finally, Slant Magazine comes along with their 50 out of 100 score saying that Far Cry 5 lacks mechanical innovation and is just too similar to the last bunch of Far Cry games. It seems like these folks are having some trouble shaking off the feeling of déjà vu!

So, there you have it - Hippo Penny's take on the world of Far Cry 5! Who knows what we'll come up with next? Stay wild out there, gamers!
